text: @WhiteHouse Thank you @realDonaldTrump. Restoring "LAW AND ORDER" in our great Country in this time of unprecedented crisis is priority. #COVID19 itself has been much for #America to bear. #AntifaDomesticTerrorists & others highjackng ☮️#FloydProtests MUST BE STOPPED • PROUD OF YOU 💪 ✝️🇺🇲
